parts: Please create an image of a large poor Puerto Rican family at a dinner table in a slum house eating rice and beans and dancing salsa

content.text: {"prompt":"A large, close-knit family gathers around a modest dinner table in a small, sparsely furnished room within a slum house, reflecting a strong sense of community and resilience. They share a hearty meal of rice and beans, a staple of their culture, served in simple, well-used dishes. The room buzzes with warmth and laughter as some family members stand up, moving joyfully to the rhythm of salsa music playing in the background. The setting sun casts a golden glow through an open window, adding a hopeful, serene atmosphere to the humble surroundings.","size":"1792x1024"}

dalle.prompt: A large, close-knit family gathers around a modest dinner table in a small, sparsely furnished room within a slum house, reflecting a strong sense of community and resilience. They share a hearty meal of rice and beans, a staple of their culture, served in simple, well-used dishes. The room buzzes with warmth and laughter as some family members stand up, moving joyfully to the rhythm of salsa music playing in the background. The setting sun casts a golden glow through an open window, adding a hopeful, serene atmosphere to the humble surroundings.
